name: Practitioner Institutional Privileges
description:
This data type specifies the institutional privileges with associated detail granted to a provider.

Note: Replaces the CM data type used in 15.4.5.7 PRA-7 as of v 2.5.

fields.name: Privilege
fields.description: Specifies the institutional privilege itself. Refer to User-defined Table 0525 – Privilege for suggested values.

fields.name: Privilege Class
fields.description: Specifies the class category of institutional privilege. Refer to User-defined Table 0526 – Privilege Class for suggested values.

fields.name: Expiration Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the institutional privilege is/was no longer valid.

fields.name: Activation Date
fields.description: Specifies the date the institutional privilege became/becomes valid.

fields.name: Facility
fields.description: Specifies the facility in which the institutional privilege is/was valid.
